doc.title: Fridays For Future - Register Country Information Form
doc.excerpt: Register your country information here, including your national social media channels, so your best posts can appear in our Social Movement Feed.

main.p: Fridays for Future is a grassroot movement where every country, city and person counts. Because of that we need your information.
Since we value your privacy all given information will only be processed by us and will not be passed on to a third party. Thank you for your trust.
main.head: Do you want to register your country information (incl. your national Social media channels?
contact us
main.p: Find all the country contact details here!
